resources.string: Information on Bluetooth connection will appear here.\n
Bluetooth must be enabled to continue
Please press the enable bluetooth to ensure the device can utilize bluetooth capabilities.
You are the most beautiful woman on this universe. You have left me entranced by who you are. There is no other person like you.
The kindness that you give me, the patience you have with me, they are the most precious gifts in my life.
And now I want to give you a gift; a small gesture to demonstrate how much I love you and how much I appreciate you.
I want to live the rest of my life at your side and I want the opportunity to make you happy as you have made me happy.
That is why I want to ask you........
